title: UCSB SDSW
text:
Statistics and Data Science Workshop Series


University of California, Santa Barbara





Welcome to the official website of the Statistics and Data Science Workshop, hosted at the University of California, Santa Barbara! Here, you can find out more about the series, as well as view the final projects of our current groups. Please note that this is a living website- check back frequently for updates!

title: Meet the Officers
text:
Founder













Kris Hao


Kris is a 3rd year SDS major.
















Founder













Anya Macomber


Anya is a 3rd year SDS major and student in UCSB’s PaCE EMT program. After her graduation in Spring 2023, she plans to work as an EMT. In her free time Anya enjoys reading, making art, and spending time with her cat, Sheldon.
















Social Media Coordinator













Mollie


Mollie.















Graduate Student Advisor













Ethan Marzban


Ethan is currently in the 3rd year of his PhD program in the PSTAT Department, having joined the department in 2020 after earning his Bachelor’s degree (also in Statistics). Outside of Statistics, he enjoys playing the piano, drinking boba, and talking about cats (and may or may not secretly be a cat himself).















Faculty Advisor













Dr. Uma Ravat


Dr. Uma Ravat.
